00016   bool end_is(const char* begin, const char* ext) {
00017     const char* end = begin + strlen(begin);
00018     int ext_length = strlen(ext);
00019     if (ext_length > end - begin) {
00020       return false;
00021     } else {
00022       return (strcmp_case(end - ext_length, ext) == 0);
00023     }
00024   }

00027   template<typename T>
00028   static T* TryInputStream(File* file) {
00029 
00030     // initialize should never close the file
00031 
00032     T* source = new T();
00033     if (source->initialize(file)) {
00034       return source;
00035     } else {
00036       delete source;
00037       return 0;
00038     }
00039   }

00048   SampleSource* OpenSource(File* raw_file, const char* filename) {
00049     ADR_GUARD("OpenSource");
00050 
00051     RefPtr<File> file(raw_file);
00052 
00053     #define TRY_SOURCE(source_type) {                                 \
00054       source_type* source = TryInputStream<source_type>(file.get());  \
00055       if (source) {                                                   \
00056         return source;                                                \
00057       } else {                                                        \
00058         file->seek(0, File::BEGIN);                                   \
00059       }                                                               \
00060     }
00061 
00062     // if filename is available, use it as a hint
00063     if (filename) {
00064       if (end_is(filename, ".wav")) {
00065 
00066         TRY_SOURCE(WAVInputStream);
00067 
00068       } else if (end_is(filename, ".ogg")) {
00069 
00070         TRY_SOURCE(OGGInputStream);
00071 
00072 #ifndef NO_MIKMOD
00073       } else if (end_is(filename, ".it") ||
00074           end_is(filename, ".xm") ||
00075           end_is(filename, ".s3m") ||
00076           end_is(filename, ".mod")) {
00077 
00078         TRY_SOURCE(MODInputStream);
00079 #endif
00080       }
00081     }
00082 
00083     // autodetect otherwise, in decreasing order of possibility of failure
00084 #ifndef NO_MIKMOD
00085     TRY_SOURCE(MODInputStream);
00086 #endif
00087     TRY_SOURCE(WAVInputStream);
00088     TRY_SOURCE(OGGInputStream);
00089 
00090     return 0;
00091   }
00092

00094   ADR_EXPORT(SampleSource*, AdrOpenSampleSource)(const char* filename) {
00095     if (!filename) {
00096       return 0;
00097     }
00098     File* file = OpenDefaultFile(filename);
00099     if (!file) {
00100       return 0;
00101     }
00102     return OpenSource(file, filename);
00103   }
00104 
00105 
00106   ADR_EXPORT(SampleSource*, AdrOpenSampleSourceFromFile)(File* file) {
00107     if (!file) {
00108       return 0;
00109     }
00110     return OpenSource(file, 0);
00111   }
